vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
PERSONAL_BANK.initialized (patch_11.sol#10) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setMinSum (patch_11.sol#16-19)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_11.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_11.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PERSONAL_BANK.collect (patch_11.sol#26-31):
	-require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)()) patch_11.sol#29
